<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">        IsStoreInst = (Info.getDstReg() == DstReg) &amp;&amp; (Info.getReg() == Reg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
